name: A Pet Dragon
description:
Who wants their own pet dragon…YOU DO!

Where do you want your dragon to live? What dragon do you want as pet? Choose from many different dragons and backgrounds. Get a flying dragon, fire dragon or a baby dragon! YUse your own photo to have them live in your house! It's simple to create and share. Use an included background (or your own, add a picture of a dragon and other items to your photo and share with friends!
